TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerOptions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access to get and set option values for a designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool EnableInSituEditing { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables in-place editing for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls.
Docs.value: `true` if in-place editing for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls is enabled; otherwise, `false`. The default is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Size GridSize { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Drawing.Size> representing the dimensions of a grid unit.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a designer shows a component's smart tag panel automatically on creation.
Docs.value: `true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`. The default is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A component's smart tag panel is set to automatically open when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.AutoShow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ShowGrid { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the grid in the designer.
Docs.value: `true` if the grid is enabled; otherwise, `false`. The default is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SnapToGrid { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables whether controls are automatically placed at grid coordinates.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseOptimizedCodeGeneration { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the component cache.
Docs.value: `true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`. The default is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The component cache is a performance enhancement that is incompatible with certain designers. You can disable it with this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseSmartTags { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables smart tags in the designer.
Docs.value: `true` if smart tags in the designer are enabled; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This option is not exposed on the **Options** item of the **Tools** menu in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseSnapLines { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables snaplines in the designer.
Docs.value: `true` if snaplines in the designer are enabled; otherwise, `false`.
